content: You understand that your “love” want’s to overturn democracy, want’s to silence the will of a majority of americans that are either apolitical or want some form of immigration control. Call is what you will, but your views are just that, views. And your actions severely put you in the wrong, despite Trump being a internet troll and the president. Step back and consider just how out of touch you are with everyone that a authority figure with the personality of a baby is in the right and you’re in the wrong.
